line.text: Welcome to the Forest World!
How are you enjoying it so far?
I have lost count of how many years I have been here...
If you go South from here you'll find The Arena. Beat the Boss and then you get a reward!
You made it this far!
I am quite surprised you got here to be honest!
Collect ancient runes to activate the portal!
Step into the portal to leave this world!
Good luck and safe travels!
...and take this gift as a sign of my goodwill. Goodbye....
Whoa! Where did you come from?
This is Winter World! Welcome.
Err yeah! You may have noticed it is pretty cold here!
Try not to step on the ice!
The Pool of Replenishment only works once!
Go on then! All I have to give you is advice!
You made it across this harsh world!
Have you collected enough ancient runes to activate the portal?
Go! Leave this world for the next!
May you have good fortune in the next world!
Welcome to The Desert!
I don't get many visitors here.
Lots of ancient stuff to explore here!
You don't have any water do you? I'm a bit parched.
I have waited here for many centuries!
Few have passed this way.
The Desert drives men mad.
The Desert is a tough place, but the next world...ha ha ha!
Farewell....oh, and this might come in handy, I have little use for it anymore...
Welcome to Cave World, blah blah blah...
What are you looking at, ugly!
Go on then! Heal yourself at the Pool of Replenishment. Don't just stand there.
Shouldn't you be going off adventuring somewhere else than here! Off you go!
Here the power of the Elements combine.
The Forces of Nature are great in this ancient Vault. Air, Fire, Ice and Water!
What lies beyong here is the Kingdom of the Mad. Do not go there!
I can not save you from what lies beyond that portal.
Here! Take this! It may be your only hope! Goodbye....
Welcome to Chaos. Why have you come to this place?
I lost my mind many years ago.
I wish I could help you, but you look helpless!
The Deceiver has laid many traps here! Beware as his illusions are everywhere.
Good luck....you will need it!
How did you find my secret hideout?
Did anyone follow you in here?
Well, I am impressed that you have come this far.
Would you like to join the Guild of Thieves?
Take this armour to improve you thieving skills and goodbye...
Welcome to End of Time.
Are you sure that you know what you are doing?
No one has got out of here alive.
Try the portal - you might survive the journey to the next world!
And so, here you stand!
What is your Quest?
Do you seek the True Grail? The Sacred Chalice?
Let the Great Sword guide you and complete your quest.
